subject: Re: Spiricom foundation?
author: mllejade
full_text:
Frank,

I hwar yiu cleer enugh! :)

Seriously, it would appear that your mind works so fast it's hard for 
your fingers to keep up typing!  I'd rather read great ideas replete 
with typos than hollow thoughts neatly typed out.

Sharon

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" 
<purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> Damn, sometimes I type almost as clear as I speak!
> 
>  Frank-S
>  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > maybe this ship could als obe sued as a Spircom like device? This 
> is a sample out of a speech syth using the chip. Now I forget what 
> site I got it from --doh! I heard 'exhausts Free Speech' or 'lost 
> free speech' in this sample, and 'They grab(for)you' right at the 
> beginning, don't know if it means anything. I also heard "the(thee) 
> box". Maybe it's all auto suggestion-LOL?
> >  
> >  Frank-S
> > _________________________________________________________________
> > Climb to the top of the charts!Play the word scramble challenge 
> with star power.
> > http://club.live.com/star_shuffle.aspx?
> icid=starshuffle_wlmailtextlink_jan
